titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

action.text: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Kennedy. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 1/31/2007--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions for the 110th Congress.
